Name: SwitchingMoveBlock
Notes: A platform that can move and rotate when SW_A gets activated. If the switch gets deactivated again, the platform returns to its original placement.

Obj_arg0.Name: X Offset
Obj_arg0.Description: How far to move the object from its position on the X-axis. Default is 0.

Obj_arg1.Name: Y Offset
Obj_arg1.Description: How far to move the object from its position on the Y-axis. Default is 0.

Obj_arg2.Name: Z Offset
Obj_arg2.Description: How far to move the object from its position on the Z-axis. Default is 0.

Obj_arg3.Name: X Rotation
Obj_arg3.Description: How much to rotate object around the X-axis. Default is 0.

Obj_arg4.Name: Y Rotation
Obj_arg4.Description: How much to rotate object around the Y-axis. Default is 0.

Obj_arg5.Name: Z Rotation
Obj_arg5.Description: How much to rotate object around the Z-axis. Default is 0.

SW_A.Description: Applies the offset and rotation to the object's placement when activated. When deactivated again, the object returns to its original placement.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.
